posts.message: I think that Google next step os unifing Android & Chrome Marketplaces ... Play?!!

I had a prospective client approach me in 2010 for some freelance writing projects. We exchanged a few emails and I never heard from her again. In May of 2012, she emails me:

CLIENT: Sorry for the delay on this. I’m ready for you now.

"I understand that you don’t work on weekends, but I have a very special circumstance. I spoke with my astrologer, and she’s assured me that my site MUST launch on the weekend of the 25-26th, or bad things will happen."
"Please let me know if you do not receive this email." - Clients From Hell.

"The garbage looks too dirty. Can we make the garbage cleaner?"
— Client request regarding pictures of a giant garbage dump
